meanings.definition: A short break taken at noon.
meanings.sent1: During the school day, students enjoy their nooners outside in the sunshine.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to my nooners to recharge and relax.
meanings.sent3: Taking a nooner helps me feel refreshed and ready for the rest of the day.
meanings.sent4: Her nooner was like a mini vacation in the middle of a busy day.
meanings.sent5: The nooner break is a welcome pause in the hustle and bustle of daily life.

meanings.definition: A sexual encounter that takes place during the middle of the day.
meanings.sent1: Some people enjoy having intimate nooners to spice up their day.
meanings.sent2: The couple sneaked in a quick nooner during their lunch break.
meanings.sent3: Having a nooner can add excitement to an otherwise ordinary afternoon.
meanings.sent4: Their secret rendezvous for a nooner was full of passion and desire.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a nooner can be thrilling and exhilarating for some couples.
